Defendant in the case who had his vehicle stopped by a United States Border Patrol agent and is a United States citizen, challenges the stop of his white sedan
Defendant in the case who was stopped by an officer of the Freer Police Department, driver of the black truck, exhibited nervous behavior during the stop, claimed the vehicle belonged to his aunt and then his cousin, transported to a checkpoint for further questioning
